name: IDBDatabase
description: The IDBDatabase interface of the IndexedDB API provides a connection to a database; you can use an IDBDatabase object to open a transaction on your database then create, manipulate, and delete objects (data) in that database. The interface provides the only way to get and manage versions of the database.

refs.name: Indexed Database API 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'IDBDatabase' in the 'Indexed Database API 2.0' specification.
